resources.string: Set up your smart home in the PR1132 gateway web interface: create groups and add channels to them.
Enter the IP address of the PR1132 gateway below, and the app will automatically load all settings.
You don’t have any groups yet. Go to settings to load them from the Ethernet gateway.
Tap “+” next to the title to create a new scenario.
Favorites are empty for now. Go to a group and tap the heart to add it here.
